sentences.sentence: Indeed, the Royal Newfoundland Constabulary recently employed the technique to help home in on the age of another homicide victim.
sentences.translation: 事实上，纽芬兰皇家警察局最近采用了该项技术，帮助推算出另一位被害人的年龄。
